mapper.select: SELECT aa.* FROM bsjbook aa, (SELECT SUM(b.order_count) order_count, a.isbn FROM bsjbook a, bsjorder_detail b WHERE a.isbn = b.isbn GROUP BY a.isbn) bb WHERE aa.isbn = bb.isbn AND ROWNUM <= 16 ORDER BY bb.order_count DESC

SELECT count(*) FROM bsjbook aa, (SELECT bb.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY bb.order_count DESC) AS row_no FROM (SELECT SUM(b.order_count) order_count, a.isbn FROM bsjbook a,
WHERE a.isbn = b.isbn GROUP BY a.isbn) bb) cc WHERE aa.isbn = cc.isbn

SELECT row_no, aa.* FROM bsjbook aa, (SELECT bb.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY bb.order_count DESC) AS row_no FROM (SELECT SUM(b.order_count) order_count, a.isbn FROM bsjbook a,
WHERE a.isbn = b.isbn GROUP BY a.isbn) bb) cc WHERE aa.isbn = cc.isbn AND row_no BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}

mapper.select: SELECT class_major FROM bsjbook aa, (SELECT sum(order_count) order_count, isbn FROM bsjorder a, bsjorder_detail b WHERE a.order_no = b.order_no AND a.user_id = #{param1} GROUP BY b.isbn) bb WHERE aa.isbn = bb.isbn ORDER BY bb.order_count DESC
SELECT a.* FROM BSJBOOK a, (SELECT isbn, sum(order_count) FROM bsjorder_detail GROUP BY isbn ORDER BY SUM(order_count) DESC) b WHERE class_major = #{param1} AND a.isbn = b.isbn AND ROWNUM <= 8
